response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds immense value to us at $1,200,000, but considering its significance to you, we aim to make it accessible. We propose to offer you the chance to own this masterpiece at a special price of $950,000. This represents a remarkable opportunity to secure a high-quality asset at a fraction of its market value. We believe this price reflects the unique value proposition and the potential benefits it offers to you. We look forward to your consideration and hope to facilitate a transaction that benefits both parties.", "product_price": 950000}
